segments.text: I hear you are moving to Dalian .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I found a very good job down here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we'll certainly miss you here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to miss you , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I will write to you as soon as I get there .
segments.speaker: S2
